TopicTitle: First to produce a rocket capable of a full range of motion using RCS

Articles.Content:
My challenge, i present to you, is the first to produce a rocket capable of a full range of motion using only RCS modules from C7 Flight pack that can hover in the air, fly around for a bit, and then land safely on the launch pad.

The craft must go through every angle possible without touching the ground between liftoff and landing

Good luck, post screenshots, vids and save data of the ships if you want

Sproginator

8)

Too late. Someone already did it.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=3157.msg32194#msg32194

Too late. Someone already did it.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=3157.msg32194#msg32194

Can you read?

He said C7, not default.

A) C7 would make it easier.

His challenge is to demonstrate full range of motion. IE; hover at every possible (or near enough for proof) angle. Not simply to fly on RCS alone.

Can you read?

He said C7, not default.

Ah. Somehow, I missed that bit. That would make it harder, as c7\'s only go one way.
